'''Tiny Miracle's Goblet''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Tiny Miracle]].

==Description==
A clear goblet glittering with starlight.<br />In the past it was used to tell fortunes,<br />For the water it held was believed to reflect the Starry Sea.
